description:
Benchmark Algorithm for Radio-Nuclide Identification (BARNI) is an automatic radionuclide identification
tool for use with gamma-ray spectra. BARNI is designed to serve as a comparative tool for commercial
vendor algorithms, such as those found in RadioIsotope Identification Devices (RIID). The tool
incorporates an automated training routine allowing BARNI's classifier to be trained for a variety of
detectors. The identification algorithm uses a peak search, the results of which are used to build features
that are subsequently used for training a classifier. The user provided spectral templates allow BARNI to
be trained for any detector of the user's choice.
Is
name: Benchmark Algorithm for RadioNuclide Identification v1.0
